posts.author: machnd_mcf
posts.text:
彼女を愛した遺伝子 (新潮文庫nex)
松尾佑一
これまで恋愛と無縁に生きてきた、遺伝子研究者の柴山と松永。ある日、柴山は女子学生と恋に落ち、それを知った松永は、研究室から失踪した。松永は「愛は遺伝子が決定する」という自らの理論を証明すべく、柴山で人体実験を企む。一方、自らもまた結ばれる確率が0%と判定された女性に、どうしようもなく心惹かれて…。愛と理論の狭間で苦悶する、純真でせつない“理系”恋愛小説。

posts.title: 大一新生雅思考试5.5上升至7分经验谈
posts.text:
拿到了8.11号的考试成绩，有些兴奋，成绩如下：总分：7，听力：8，阅读：6.5，写作：6.5，口语：6.5
作为一个大一的学生，虽早已开始准备但由于基础不好(高考英语分数：92)，而感觉相对吃力.从去年9月到今年8月，正式开始接触一年左右最终拿到了极为满意的分数.下面就谈谈我的想法：
1.单词总被看作最为重要的一部分，殊不知，若拿着几本单词书是几乎没作用的，我曾在去年9月-10月背过那本新东方出的词根词缀的单词书(所谓的红宝书系列)，挺棒的，但时间与精力往往不够你背完，常常今天背了，明天忘.久了我便丢弃了.但这并不代表没记单词，通过阅读你会积累大量的单词，当然作文的积累也是有利于单词量的.
2.听力的训练，最初就是听新东方出的《雅思听力胜策》，接着就是《雅思考试胜策》听力，再后来是世图出的《雅思听力高分榜中榜》当然《剑桥雅思》1-6是掉不了的.
3.阅读就得下工夫了，除了6本剑桥雅思外，新航道出的《阅读真经》2本全做.
4.写作是我本最弱的，那么除了自己练以外，看范文是最最important，除了书店里卖的以外，有条件的可以去学校图书馆借国防工业出版社出的留学英语考试作文模版系列的.
5.口语，最好能自己归纳话题类型，照准机经，找个人，不论英语水平多差，只要能读的出问题的就行，每天练习，直到寻找的话题已练完，还有一个小窍门，就是把第一部分的句型及单词用好，那么后面就不怕了.当然语音语调表情也是关键，照着镜子，多点自信就行了.
再给大家一点经验，我是个狂爱看电视电影的人，听电影就成了我的爱好之一，现有一网站由此类下载: www.veryabc.cn
有ipod的可以听听podcast的新闻或其他的.
考试前看机经也是非常有必要的，考试时放轻松，不行就深呼吸，很有用的. eü5|ªýã4bbs.chuguo.cnÚe aä*øÀa << 上一主题 | 下一主题 >>

posts.author: Endro Yuwanto
posts.title: SM Pertamina Raih Kemenangan Perdana di Perbasi Cup 2017
posts.text:
30 WIB SM Pertamina Raih Kemenangan Perdana di Perbasi Cup 2017 Rep: Fitriyanto/ Red: Endro Yuwanto Republika/Fitriyanto Latihan Perdana SM Pertamina. Dalam rangka persiapan Perbasi Cup 2017. Juara bertahan Satria Muda (SM) Pertamina menggelar latihan perdana, Senin (6/11) di Mahaka Square Kelapa Gading Jakarta Utara, latihan langsung dipimpin pelatih kepala Youbel Sondakh. 
REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, JAKARTA -- Juara bertahan Satria Muda (SM) Pertamina berhasil meraih kemenangan perdana dalam Perbasi Cup 2017. Bertanding di Mahaka Square Kelapa Gading Jakarta Utara, Selasa (7/11), tim asuhan Youbel Sondakh unggul atas Siliwangi Bandung dengan skor 70-43 (32-26).SM Pertamina menurunkan lima pemain lokal sejak awal pertandingan, yakni Hardianus Lakudu, Juan Laurent Kokodiputra, Arki Dikania Wisnu, Kevin Yonas Sitorus Argadia, dan Christian Ronaldo Sitepu. Sementara, Siliwangi langsung menurunkan dua pemain asingnya sejak awal permainan, yakni Anthony Donnavan Hastings dan Darnell Brown untuk mendukung Azzaryan Praddhitya, Aditya Reynaldi Lumanauw, dan Dian Heryadi.Kuarter pertama pertandingan berlangsung menarik, Siliwangi mampu mengimbangi permainan SM Pertamina. Arki dan rekan-rekanya hanya unggul 16-14 di akhir kuarter pertama. Kuarter dua SM Pertamina masih unggul 32-26. Demikian pula kuarter tiga, SM Pertamina walau unggul namun masih tidak terlalu jauh yakni 46-37.Kuarter akhir SM Pertamina baru mulai menjauh dengan meraih 24 angka. Sementara, Siliwangi hanya menambah enam angka. SM Pertamina pun memenangkan laga ini dengan skor 70-43.Meski hanya bermain sekitar 20 menit, dua pemain asing SM Pertamina masih mendominasi perolehan poin. Dior Lowhorn mencetak 17 poin, 13 rebound, dan Kevin Bridgwaters mencetak 14 poin, Juan Laurent menambah 11 poin termasuk tiga kali tembakan tiga angka yang berhasil dari enam kali percobaan.Meski menang dalam pertandingan kali ini, pelatih kepala SM Pertamina Youbel Sondakh mengaku masih belum puas dengan penampilan yang ditunjukkan para pemainnya. "Ini baru kali ketiga mereka bermain bersama. Belum terjadi keselarasan tim, terutama dengan pemain asing. Yang sesama pemain lokal sudah lumayan." Terbukti, kata Youbel, di kuarter akhir saat SM Pertamina menurunkan para pemain lokal, timnya dapat bermain dengan baik. "Tetapi secara keseluruhan saya belum puas. Untuk pemain asing skill sudah sesuai dengan ekspektasi saya. Tinggal bagaimana mereka dapat menyatu dengan tim," jelas Youbel.Pelatih kepala Siliwangi Ali Budimansyah mengaku secara keseluruhan cukup puas dengan apa yang ditunjukkan pemainnya. "Secara keseluruhan saya kasih nilai 7 untuk permainan kali ini. Tadi SM Pertamina sempat deg-degan juga lawan kami. Sayang di kuarter akhir pemain kami menurun staminanya. Kendala para pemain kami adalah di stamina, wajar kami baru 10 hari kumpul."Dengan hasil ini, Siliwangi masih memimpin Pool C. Pada pertandingan pertama Senin (6/11), Siliwangi menang dari NSH. SM Pertamina akan melanjutkan pertandingan kedua, Rabu (8/11) pukul 17.00 WIB melawan NSH. Jika menang, maka SM Pertamina akan keluar sebagai juara Pool C dan lolos ke semifinal.

thread.title: Maija Vilkkumaa Kallion lukion kohusta: "Koulu ja sen entiset rehtorit pitää saattaa vastuuseen"
thread.title_full: Maija Vilkkumaa Kallion lukion kohusta: "Koulu ja sen entiset rehtorit pitää saattaa vastuuseen"

posts.title: Maija Vilkkumaa Kallion lukion kohusta: "Koulu ja sen entiset rehtorit pitää saattaa vastuuseen"
posts.text:
Maija Vilkkumaa kuvattuna 14. elokuuta 2017. Lehtikuva 
Kallion lukion käynyt Maija Vilkkumaa avautuu Twitterissä viikonloppuna nousseesta helsinkiläislukion miesopettajaa koskevasta kohusta. 
STT uutisoi sunnuntaina Helsingin Kallion lukion miespuolisen lehtorin epäasiallisesta käytöksestä vuodesta 2000 tähän vuoteen asti. Osa haastatelluista opiskelijoista ei kokenut fyysistä lähentelyä, mutta lähes kaikki kertoivat oudosta seksuaalisesti virittyneestä tunnelmasta opettajan läheisyydessä. 
Laulaja Maija Vilkkumaa , 44, opiskeli Kallion lukiossa 1990-luvulla. Vilkkumaa kirjoitti Twitter-tilillään sunnuntaina kohusta.   
– Ei ollut minun opettaja, mutta minun aikanani. Kiinnitin ulkopuolelta huomiota hänen tyyliinsä valikoida suosikkeja epämääräisin perustein, Vilkkumaa twiittaa. 
– Tehdä normiopetuksen ulkopuolisia "superproduktioita", joihin valikoitiin ihmisiä salamyhkäisesti, kukaan ei tiennyt missä mennään, hän jatkaa. 
– Oppilailla outo olo koko hommasta, ja lukiolainen kokee olevansa vääränlainen, vaikka todellisuudessa "pedagogi" on kusipää, Vilkkumaa toteaa. 
Laulaja ei sievistele sanoissaan. 
– Persenaama vallankäyttäjä, kuten nämä kaikki. Uskomatonta, ettei koulu ole reagoinut, vaikka asiasta on puhuttu vuosia. 
– Koulu ja sen entiset rehtorit pitää saattaa vastuuseen tästä, Vilkkumaa toteaa. 
Vilkkumaa twiittasi aiheesta vielä tänään tiistaina. 
– Salailun kulttuuri jatkuu. Oppilaat, opettajat: puhukaa. Kaikille. 
– Hyväksikäyttäjäopettajien valta perustuu juuri hiljaisuudelle. Työyhteisö, jossa vaaditaan salailua ja hiljaisuutta, ei ole terve. Puhukaa. 
Epäasiallisesta käytöksestä syytetty Kallion ilmaisutaidon lukion opettaja itse myönsi STT:lle käyttäytyneensä harjoitustilanteissa "provosoivasti" 15–20-vuotta sitten, mutta kiistää ahdistelleensa harjoituksissa tai niiden ulkopuolella. 
–  Näyttämöllä hän saattoi seistä takanani, kun muut olivat edessä, ja laittaa käden perseelle tai painautua lantioon kiinni, yksi haastatelluista kertoi. 
Moni STT:n haastattelema nainen kertoi, että opettajan vetämät harjoitukset olivat todella fyysisiä, ja opettaja oli monesti itse mukana. Improvisaatiota tehtiin paljon, ja se saattoi johtaa raiskauksen näyttelemiseen. 
Raiskausharjoituksista kertoi STT:lle ainakin kolme naista, jotka opiskelivat lukiossa vuosien 1999 ja 2007 välillä. Opettaja: Raiskausharjoitus "ehkä kerran" 
Opettajan itsensä mukaan 15–20 vuotta sitten hänen ammattitaitonsa ei ollut vielä hyvä ja hänen opetustapansa on voitu kokea hyökkääväksi. Mistään seksuaalisesta opettajan mukaan ei kuitenkaan ole ollut kyse. 
–  Se toiminta oli pedagogisesti siinä määrin epäonnistunutta, että voin hyvin ymmärtää, että siinä on ollut väärinkäsityksiä. 
Opettajan mukaan hän on tehnyt raiskausharjoitteen "ehkä kerran". 
–  Silloinkaan en ollut hyökkäävänä osapuolena, hän sanoo STT:lle. 
Raiskausharjoituksista on kertonut STT:lle ainakin kolme naista, jotka opiskelivat lukiossa vuosien 1999 ja 2007 välillä. 
Taideyliopiston Teatterikorkeakoulun professori, näyttelijä Elina Knihtilä kommentoi STT:n pyynnöstä opiskelijoiden kertomia harjoituksia. Hän sanoo, ettei ymmärrä, miksi raiskausta harjoitellaan ylipäätään ja ettei harjoituksessa kuulu ahdistaa. 
–  Jos pienikin tällainen vire syntyy, olen todella huolissani pedagogisista lähtökohdista. 
Lue lisää aiheesta täällä .

thread.title: Emotional Challenges to Rational Investing - Part 1 - Investing with Prudence
thread.title_full: Emotional Challenges to Rational Investing - Part 1 - Investing with Prudence | I3investor

posts.author: arif
posts.title: Emotional Challenges to Rational Investing - Part 1 - Investing with Prudence
posts.text:
Investing should be a rational process. Very few would dispute that. But more often than not, emotions prevail in investing. Our investing decisions get clouded, at times even drowned by our emotions. We simply get swept away by our feelings instead of guided and enlightened by our intellect and rational judgments.
Having said that, I do not mean that emotions have no role in investing. It is in fact useful for everyone to experience the swings of emotions - the fear and greed, the pride, the confidence, the excitement - the whole investing experience. This experience is very useful indeed - for how else can one truly understand the market sentiment? How else could one fathom the excitement and the bouyant optimism of the market participants when the bulls prevail, or the gripping fear that freeze the minds of market participants when the confidence suddenly evaporates?
This is just a little story about my personal experience in stocks investing. It is an account of how a financial literate lost significant sum in the stock market, quit investing for many years and finally returned in an attempt at recovering what he had lost.
My serious encounter with the market began in 2002. Having had some of my EPF funds invested in a few unit trusts with positive results, I thought … why couldn’t I do it myself? After all, you paid a few percent of your fund value to the unit trust managers, and despite that they still end up with respectable net gains for the funds.
So I withdrew a portion of my EPF and parked at an approved fund manager, in an arrangement that aloowed me to manage the funds on line. There was still a fee payable to the fund manager but not as much as that under a discretionary account. There were some limitations under the arrangement, where EPF disallowed certain stocks and certain instruments such as warrants, for understandable reason.
I started off quite well. I bought some well established stocks which were at time were obviously underpriced - the likes of CIMB and YTL, when they were not overpriced, you couldnt really go wrong. And naturally I made respectable gains. I was not long before over-confidence and recklessness set in. With my fund flushed with cash and profits from those stocks I disposed, I turned my attention to the third liners, expecting more interesting adventure and a bigger victory of course.
Some of these stocks were already listed for some time. Some were only newly floated. They apparently had quite convincing plans and sound business models. But they had no history of profits. And I knew little about the people that ran them. What I was betting on were the promise and the hope they were parading. Without a history of consistent profits or a a solid contract or concession, It isnt easy to determine values for such companies. It is here that my financial literacy broke down.
The best indicator of the "attractiveness" of the stocks were the prevailing prices then relative to what they were before. Seeing than some were much lower priced than before, I impatiently collected them in significant quantities. The 'urge' to buy was so intense that I could not even wait a little while to seek some information about the companies' respective positions and the reasons for the adverse price movements.
The prices of most of the stocks continued declining -10% and later 20% and later 30% lower. But I kept telling myself that they would recover. The thought of cutting loss was there. But I kept thinking how could I suffer - or even acknowledge - losses when I had done so well before that? Denial prevailed and I kept holding those losing stocks. As the loss was quite depressing, I took a break and avoided looking at the stocks, and the market too. By the time I looked at them again, they had lost almost all 80% of their combined value.
When I was overwhelmed by my emotions and let them take control, I lost the rational bearing. I just abandoned rational course of actions I should have pursued. I should have looked for the underlying reasons why the stocks' prices declined. It shoudl have been a simple process. Get the information which was quite readiy available. If the prices fell merely because of bad sentiments or due to misunderstood factors, I shoudl have kept the stocks. I should have bought even some more. But if the prices crashed because of bad gearing, failing business, frauds or major legal actions - then I shoudl have cut losses.
All these sound easier with hindsight, of course! But when I was in the middle of the depressing situation, nothing looked like a more comforting just than holding on to what I had bought.

三島由紀夫 「潮騒」：爽快な読後感

thread.section_title: Jobs
thread.title: (USA-WA-RICHLAND) Chemist
thread.title_full: (USA-WA-RICHLAND) Chemist

posts.title: (USA-WA-RICHLAND) Chemist
posts.text:
Group: Chemistry Nuclear Materials 
Job Description 
The National Security Directorate is seeking a Chemist to run clean-chemistry separation and analysis procedures and support ultra-trace analytical chemistry methods research and development. The candidate should have a growing record of independent contributions to research programs and possess the ability to interact with dynamic, multi-disciplinary teams. This position will report through the line management structure for the Radiochemical Analysis group. Work scope will be focused on experimental studies and the execution and development of highly complex analytical chemistry procedures, with applications including national and homeland security, nuclear nonproliferation, and nuclear material detection and characterization. Both independently and in collaboration with internal peers and project teams the position will support a range of US government and private clients. The research groups seeking to fill this position support a number of critical national security missions along with missions relating to plutonium processing and process monitoring, next generation nuclear fuel cycles, and international nuclear safeguards and treaty monitoring. Projects within the research group range from highly applied projects in support of the U.S. Government to fundamental projects in the areas of nuclear science and novel technology exploration. 
Responsibilities and Accountabilities: 
The incumbent will execute research tasks independently and recommend technical approaches within multi-disciplinary teams to produce cutting-edge research, and should be aware of research going on at the national and international level that affects their project scope, and possess the ability to maintain skills consistent with state-of-the-art. 
The incumbent will actively contribute to publications; may participate in professional activities such as presenting technical results at project working group meetings. Will contribute to the positive outcome of milestone level activities and be able to define deliverables at the task level. Marketing achieved through excellent performance on projects and contributing to the development of new capabilities within the division. 
Minimum Qualifications 
Bachelor's degree in Analytical Chemistry, Inorganic Chemistry, Geochemistry, Radiochemistry, Nuclear Engineering, or related technical field and 2+ years of experience. 
or 
Master's degree Analytical Chemistry, Inorganic Chemistry, Geochemistry, Radiochemistry, Nuclear Engineering, or related technical field. 
Must demonstrate a growing record of independent contributions to research programs and the following laboratory experience and skills: 
- Experience working in a clean analytical laboratory setting 
- Demonstrated ability to safely handle radiological materials and hazardous / corrosive chemicals 
- Experience working with QA/QC driven analytical protocols or other quality requirements 
- Experience developing methods for environmental sampling or laboratory post-collection sample analysis including ultra-trace level separations and analysis are highly desirable. 
- Experience preparing samples for mass spectrometric analysis, operating mass spectrometers, or interpreting mass spectrometric data. 
Demonstrated ability to safely handle radiological materials and hazardous / corrosive chemicals 
Preferred Qualifications 
PhD in Analytical Chemistry, Inorganic Chemistry, Geochemistry, Radiochemistry, Nuclear Engineering, or related technical field. 
Equal Employment Opportunity 
PNNL is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer that is committed to hiring a diverse, talented workforce. EOE Disability/Vet/M/F/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity. Staff at PNNL must be able to demonstrate the legal right to work in the United States. 
Other Information 
This position requires the ability to obtain and maintain a federal security clearance. 
Requirements: 
* U.S. Citizenship 
* Background Investigation: Applicants selected will be subject to a Federal background investigation and must meet eligibility requirements for access to classified matter in accordance 10 CFR 710, Appendix B. 
* Drug Testing: All Security Clearance (L or Q) positions will be considered by the Department of Energy to be Testing Designated Positions which means that they are subject to applicant, random, and for cause drug testing. In addition, applicants must be able to demonstrate non-use of illegal drugs, including marijuana, for the 12 consecutive months preceding completion of the requisite Questionnaire for National Security Positions (QNSP). 
Note: Applicants will be considered ineligible for security clearance processing by the U.S. Department of Energy until non-use of illegal drugs, including marijuana, for 12 consecutive months can be demonstrated. 
Directorate: National Security Dir 
Group: Chemistry of Nuclear Mtrls 
Opening Date: 2017-11-06

thread.section_title: LOGGIA HEREDOM 1224 - CAGLIARI
thread.title: Il cuore è un cristallo alchemico
thread.title_full: Il cuore è un cristallo alchemico

posts.author: Grand Chapter of Royal Arch Masons of Italy (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Il cuore è un cristallo alchemico
posts.text:
Portando l’attenzione al centro del tuo petto puoi percepire lo spazio del tuo cuore. Resta in ascolto, e potrai accorgerti della vastità di percezioni che è in grado di proporti: apertura, amore, pace, malinconia, agitazione, gioia, tristezza o una sorta di bruciore. Ognuna di queste sensazioni è come un filtro attraverso cui si forma la tua realtà: è come puntare luce verso un cristallo semitrasparente, per vederla poi uscire trasformata nei toni di colore di cui il cristallo è composto. Ogni sensazione proietta così una diversa scena nel film della tua vita e la buona notizia è che il tuo cuore è un cristallo alchemico, che cambia continuamente forma e ha il potere di riscrivere la sceneggiatura in ogni momento. Niente è fissato e ogni cosa è possibile, tutto ciò che devi fare è connetterti con lui e lasciarlo esprimere. Conosci percettivamente lo spazio del tuo cuore lasciati sovrastare dalle sensazioni che lì si sono accumulate, sentile consciamente e le vedrai sciogliersi dolcemente. Sii gentile con il tuo sentire e il tuo film si trasformerà. La vita può essere osservata così, una scena dopo l’altra, e ti ricorderai che in verità tu non se né il cristallo né il film, ma la luce che crea ogni forma, colore e suono!

Fonte: Spazio Interiore Pubblicato da  ArcoReale

posts.title: [美친box] '토르: 라그나로크', 17일째 예매율 1위…신작 공세도 이길까
posts.text:
입력 : 2017.11.07 17:11 
[OSEN=장진리 기자] 마블 영화 '토르: 라그나로크'가 17일 연속 예매율 1위를 이어가고 있다. 
'토르: 라그나로크'(타이카 와이티티 감독)는 17일 연속 예매율 1위를 석권하고 있어 신작 공세 속 흥행세에 관심이 쏠린다. 
역대 '토르' 시리즈의 흥행 역사를 새롭게 쓰고 있는 '토르: 라그나로크'는 17일 연속 예매율 정상을 지키고 있다. 김혜수, 이선균, 이희준 주연의 '미옥'과 신하균, 도경수 주연의 '7호실'까지 쟁쟁한 한국 영화들이 연이어 개봉 준비를 하고 있는 가운데, 과연 예매율 정상을 지키고 있는 '토르: 라그나로크'가 박스오피스 정상을 줄곧 지킬 수 있을지 기대가 모아진다. 
특히 '토르: 라그나로크'는 시리즈 사상 최고 누적 관객 수를 경신한 것은 물론, 400만 관객 돌파까지 눈앞에 두고 있다. 7일 오후 4시 기준 약 367만 명의 관객을 모은 '토르: 라그나로크'가 400만을 넘어 어디까지 향할 수 있을지도 초미의 관심이 쏠린다. 
한편 '토르: 라그나로크'는 온 세상의 멸망 ‘라그나로크’를 막기 위해 마블 최초의 여성 빌런 헬라에 맞선 토르가 헐크와도 피할 수 없는 대결을 펼치게 되는 내용을 그린다. /mari@osen.co.kr

thread.title: Democrats try to look forward but are still haunted by 2016
thread.title_full: Democrats try to look forward but are still haunted by 2016

posts.title: Democrats try to look forward but are still haunted by 2016
posts.text:
Democrats try to look forward but are still haunted by 2016 2017-11-07T08:53:04Z 2017-11-07T20:48:54Z (Win McNamee/Pool Photo via AP, File). FILE - In this Jan. 20, 2017, file photo, former Sen. Hillary Clinton and former President Bill Clinton arrive on the West Front of the U.S. Capitol on Friday, Jan. 20, 2017, in Washington, for the inauguration ce... (AP Photo/Cliff Owen, File). FILE - In this Nov. 16, 2016 file photo, Hillary Clinton speaks in Washington. Time has not healed the Democratic party’s wounds. On Election Day 2016, Democrats suffered a devastating and shocking loss. A year later, they’... Tuesday, November 7 2017 3:14 AM EST 2017-11-07 08:14:20 GMT Updated: Tuesday, November 7 2017 3:47 PM EST 2017-11-07 20:47:48 GMT Voters in Virginia, New Jersey picking new governors in contests that could be an early referendum on President Donald Trump. More >> Voters in Virginia, New Jersey picking new governors in contests that could be an early referendum on President Donald Trump. More >> Tuesday, November 7 2017 9:23 AM EST 2017-11-07 14:23:22 GMT Updated: Tuesday, November 7 2017 12:26 PM EST 2017-11-07 17:26:04 GMT Governors, mayors, Medicaid: The top US races on Tuesday. More >> Governors, mayors, Medicaid: The top US races on Tuesday. More >> 
By NICHOLAS RICCARDIAssociated Press 
Time has not healed the Democratic party's wounds. 
On Election Day 2016, Democrats suffered a devastating and shocking loss. A year later, they're still sorting through the wreckage. The infighting, the divisive personalities and the questions about how it happened are still front and center, threatening to hold the party back in elections on Tuesday and into next year's midterms. 
Hillary Clinton is on a tour promoting her book on last year's campaign, entitled "What Happened." The man she defeated in the party's presidential primaries, Bernie Sanders, and former Vice President Joe Biden are the two top possible presidential contenders in 2020. And just in time for a crucial race for Virginia governor, the Democratic National Committee's former chairwoman, Donna Brazile, last week reopened the wounds over whether the party tilted the primary in Clinton's favor. 
"2016 may be the first year on record that is actually 23 months long," said Jesse Ferguson, a former Clinton campaign aide. 
Ferguson, like many Democrats, is aware of the danger in dwelling on the past. He noted that, after Republicans failed to defeat Barack Obama in 2012, the GOP commissioned an "autopsy" that argued the party should moderate its stands on immigration to win growing minority communities. Really? Trump promptly won the next presidential election on a hardline immigration platform. 
"The biggest mistake we'd make is figuring out how we would have succeeded in 2016 rather than how we can succeed in 2018 and 2020," Ferguson said. 
Trump isn't making moving on easy. During the campaign, he gleefully stoked the Sanders-Clinton division, touting hacked DNC emails that purported to show how party leaders tilted the primary toward Clinton. He hasn't let up much, now arguing that federal prosecutors should be investigating this collusion rather than his own campaign's possible coordination with Russia, whom intelligence officials blame for the DNC hack. 
The president is pouring salt in what may be the party's deepest wound. Sanders supporters pushed their own candidate to lead the DNC this winter, but Rep. Keith Ellison of Minnesota was narrowly defeated by former Labor Secretary Tom Perez and now is Perez's deputy. 
Perez's predecessor was Brazile, who is now is promoting her own book about last year's election - and her take on the race is rattling Democrats. She claims she thought about trying to replace Clinton with Biden after the Democratic nominee fainted in September. And Brazile says a fundraising agreement between the Clinton campaign and the DNC gave the candidate too much control over party resources. 
Some Democrats were dismayed to see this division re-emerge just days before a critical race for Virginia governor where the party's candidate is in a tight race. 
"We have a president who his dismantling every institution that we hold dear," said Robert Becker, a senior adviser to Sanders' presidential race, who was not critical of Brazile's timing but wants recriminations to end. "It's time to bury this hatchet. We need to get into the business of winning some elections here." 
The party has several big choices to make. Some argue for a greater focus on white voters who didn't graduate from college, a demographic that swung sharply to Trump, especially in the Rust Belt states that handed the president his Electoral College margin of victory. Others contend the party has to reach out to more affluent, college-educated whites who may lean conservative but are disgusted by Trump. Still others call for an intense focus on young, black and Latino voters to turbocharge the base of the party. 
"We're only talking about 2016 in a way that will help us in 2018," said Rebecca Katz, a New York-based Democratic strategist who has advocated for the party bringing in more liberal voters. "If we're going to win in 2018, we have to get our base out to the polls." 
There have been some promising signs on that front. 
Democrats have a shot at capturing the House majority next year, thanks to GOP retirements and solid recruitment of candidates in competitive seats. The Democrats need to flip 24 seats to win control of the House, and their top targets are the 23 districts where Clinton prevailed over Trump last year. The Senate poses a greater challenge, with 10 Democrats seeking re-election in states Trump won. 
The party is awash in new candidates and money is pouring in for its House races. According to an analysis by the publication Roll Call, 16 Democratic challengers outraised Republican incumbents in the most recent quarter. 
Meanwhile, the Republicans are engaged in their own brutal infighting. Two retiring senators have warned that Trump is a danger. Former presidential counselor Steve Bannon is seeking primary challengers to other GOP senators. The Republicans' legislative agenda is at risk of complete collapse, and speculation swirls that prominent Republicans like Ohio Gov. John Kasich could take Trump on in 2020. 
The Democrats have dozens of elected officials thinking about the presidential race, but two party elders loom over the field -- Sanders, 76, and Biden, 74. Still, Democrats argue that, unlike last election, no candidate has an obvious advantage with the party establishment. "No one is freezing the field this time around," strategist Jim Manley said. 
Jeff Weaver, who was Sanders' 2016 campaign manager, argues that the splits in the party are just the latest version of a battle that's been raging ever since the 1990s between liberal activists and a more centrist establishment. "It keeps bubbling up, and until that's addressed it's going to keep bubbling up and continue to affect elections," Weaver said. 
___ 
Associated Press writer Thomas Beaumont in Des Moines, Iowa, contributed to this report. Copyright 2017 The Associated Press. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.

posts.author: 디지털이슈팀 기자( freezone@chosun.com )
posts.title: 美 퍼스트레이디가 샤이니 민호 보고 웃은 이유
posts.text: 입력 : 2017.11.07 17:11 | 수정 : 2017.11.07 18:20 /TV조선 캡처 미국 퍼스트레이디인 멜라니아 트럼프 여사가 보이 그룹 샤이니 민호를 보고 미소를 보인 것이 네티즌 사이서 화제다.7일 도널드 트럼프 미국 대통령과 함께 내한한 멜라니아 여사는 주한 미국 대사관에서 샤이니 민호와 함께 '걸스 플레이2' 캠페인에 참석했다. 해당 캠페인은 주한미국대사관이 여학생들을 대상으로 추진한 '2018 평창 동계올림픽' 홍보 캠페인이다.오후 1시 캠페인에 참여한 멜라니아 여사는 "평창동계올림픽이 임박해 전 세계가 평창 올림픽을 기대하고 있다"며 "스포츠에 대한 사랑으로 세계를 하나로 묶어낼 최상의 기회다. 올림픽을 앞두고 더 많은 소녀가 스포츠에 참가할 기회를 얻게 되길 바란다"고 말했다.이어 "소년과 소녀는 똑같이 스포츠를 누릴 권리가 있어 이들에게 동등한 권리와 기회를 줘야 한다"고 덧붙였다. /채널A 캡처 각자 발언을 마친 두 사람은 캠페인 홍보를 위해 참석한 학생들과 포토라인에 나란히 섰다. 그 와중에 한 학생이 민호를 보고 깜짝 놀라 주저앉자 민호가 당황하며 웃었다. 그 모습을 지켜보던 멜라니아 여사도 학생과 민호가 귀여운 듯 흐뭇한 미소를 머금었다. /채널A 캡처 이 모습을 방송으로 본 네티즌들은 "민호 외모가 국위선양했다" "멜라니아도 인정한 미모"라는 등 여러가지 반응을 보였다. thread.title: «Нефтяному» укреплению рубля поможет «календарный фактор»
thread.title_full: «Нефтяному» укреплению рубля поможет «календарный фактор»

posts.author: ФБА «Экономика сегодня»
posts.title: «Нефтяному» укреплению рубля поможет «календарный фактор»
posts.text:
Оставить комментарий 
Рост рубля на торгах по отношению к доллару и евро обусловлен подорожавшей нефтью, однако в этот процесс внесет свои коррективы Центробанк . Об этом ФБА "Экономика сегодня" рассказал доцент факультета финансов и банковского дела РАНХиГС Сергей Хестанов . 
"Несколько последних дней ознаменовались серьезным ростом нефтяных котировок на мировых биржах — баррель побил многолетние рекорды, что не могло не сказаться на курсе российской валюты. Однако существенный рост рубля не выгоден бюджету РФ, так как разбалансирует его возможным снижением экспортных доходов. И на сегодняшний день укрепление отечественной валюты будет ограничиваться сразу двумя факторами. 
Главный из них — политика российских монетарных властей. Как только появляются тенденции к существенному укреплению рубля, Центробанк РФ начинает закупки иностранной валюты. Такие меры серьезным образом сдерживают рост, а объемы закупок позволяют удерживать курс в нужном "коридоре". Рост нефтяных цен уже приносит существенные прибыли российскому бюджету, серьезное укрепление отечественной валюты этому притоку только помешает", — считает специалист. 
На открытии торгов на Московской бирже рубль продемонстрировал рост по отношению к доллару и евро. Эксперты склонны связывать это с подорожавшей нефтью — все прошедшие праздники баррель укреплял свои позиции. Курс доллара расчетами "завтра" утром во вторник опустился на 74 копейки и составил 58,34 рубля, курс евро снизился на 94 копейки и достиг 67,66 рубля. Январский фьючерс на нефть марки Brent утром во вторник стоит 64,27 доллара за баррель, достигнув уровня весны 2015 года. "Второй существенный фактор, который сдержит рост нефти, а значит, и рубля — нефтедобытчики сланцевых месторождений США. Рост нефтяных котировок стимулирует их нарастить добычу, что создаст избыток на рынке и окажет давление на цены. Наряду с мерами Центробанка этот фактор существенно сдержит наметившийся рост курса российской валюты", — подчеркивает экономист. 
Календарный фактор 
В России к прогнозам стоимости нефтяных котировок подходят достаточно осторожно. Так, в начале сентября глава Минэнерго России Александр Новак заявлял: ведомство опирается на мнение, что в 2018 году стоимость эталонного сорта нефти Brent в 2018 году будет колебаться в диапазоне 45-55 долларов за баррель. Нынешний рост барреля связали с арестом нескольких принцев в Саудовской Аравии и напряженных отношений США с Ираном. 
Независимое Национальное рейтинговое агентство предсказало, что нефтяные цены стабилизируются в 2018 году, а в течение нескольких лет могут вырасти до 100 долларов за баррель. По мнению аналитиков, в последние годы нефтяные компании резко сократили инвестиции в производство, а значит, в скором будущем стоит ждать кризиса предложения на сырьевом рынке, что вызовет рост цен. 
"Как известно, в четвертом квартале года все госведомства начинают спешно осваивать бюджетные средства и реализовывать программы, которые не успели закончить за предыдущие месяцы. Потому с октября по декабрь экономика РФ получает дополнительные деньги и показывает позитивные тенденции. Как правило, эти процессы сопровождаются укреплением курса рубля. 
Но Центробанк не может допустить существенный рост курса отечественной валюты и негативные эффекты для экономики. Потому "календарный фактор", безусловно, поможет укрепить рубль, но резкое увеличение нефтяных цен для валютного рынка — более важный фактор. Мы видим, что рубль от колебания нефтяных котировок менее зависим, но, с другой стороны, полностью от этого влияния не избавился. 
В силу того, что российский бюджет в значительной мере формируется поступлениями от нефтегазового экспорта, отечественная валюта от такой зависимости полностью избавиться в обозримом будущем не сможет. Скорее всего, мы наблюдаем краткосрочное явление, и вряд ли рубль продолжит серьезно укрепляться в ближайшие месяцы", — заключает эксперт. 
Смотрите курсы валют, прогнозы и рыночные сводки на Рамблере . ФБА «Экономика сегодня»: последние новости

posts.author: FOCUS
posts.title: Tierischer Einsatz in München - Feuerwehr fischt Flusskrebse aus Brunnen in München
posts.text:
Dienstag, 07.11.2017, 10:15 
Die Feuerwehr in München ist am Montagvormittag zu einem tierischen Einsatz gerufen worden: Mitarbeiter des Baureferats hatten drei Flusskrebse in einem Brunnen in der bayerischen Landeshauptstadt vorgefunden. 
Die Mitarbeiter wollten den Brunnen in der Dachauerstraße winterfest machen, als sie die drei etwa 15 Zentimeter großen Tiere entdeckten. 
Nachdem die hinzugezogenen Beamten der Feuerwehr München setzten daraufhin die Flusskrebse in einen großen, mit Wasser befüllten Eimer und brachten sie zur Hauptfeuerwache. Dort wurden die Tiere von Fachkundingen als heimische Flusskrebse identifiziert. Schließlich entließ man sie an einer ruhigen Stell der Isar in die "große Freiheit", so die Feuerwehr München auf Facebook . 
Wie die Flusskrebse in den Brunnen gelangten, ist unklar. Im Video: Meteorologe erklärt: Wird das wirklich der kälteste Winter aller Zeiten? FOCUS Online/Wochit Meteorologe erklärt: Wird das wirklich der kälteste Winter aller Zeiten? ms Vielen Dank! Ihr Kommentar wurde abgeschickt.

NTV’de canlı olarak yayınlanan tüm programlar ile ilgili bilgiler, program bölümleri ve programlarla ilgili haberler NTV Ekranı’nda. Günlük NTV yayın akışı ve program saatlerini de NTV Ekranı kategorisinden saat bazında görebilirsiniz. %100 Futbol ile son dakika spor haberlerini, Gündem Masası ile gündem haberleri ile ilgili değerlendirmeleri NTV Ekranı’nda.

thread.title_full: Mr. David Cates reports URANIUM PARTICIPATION CORPORATION RE

posts.author: stockwatch.com
posts.title: Mr. David Cates reports URANIUM PARTICIPATION CORPORATION RE
posts.text:
Mr. David Cates reports
URANIUM PARTICIPATION CORPORATION REPORTS URANIUM PURCHASES AND ESTIMATED NET ASSET VALUE AT OCTOBER 31, 2017
Uranium Participation Corp.'s (UPC) estimated net asset value at Oct. 31, 2017, was $436.6-million or $3.30 per share. As at Oct. 31, 2017, UPC's uranium investment portfolio consisted of investments shown in the attached table.
INVESTMENT PORTFOLIO (in thousands of Canadian dollars, except quantity amounts) Quantity Fair value Investments in uranium Uranium oxide in concentrates (U3O8) 10,680,024 lb $ 274,706 Uranium hexafluoride (UF6) 1,903,471 kg U $ 138,046 $ 412,752 U3O8 fair value per pound In Canadian dollars (1) $ 25.72 In United States dollars $ 19.95 UF6 fair value (1) per kg U In Canadian dollars (1) $ 72.52 In United States dollars $ 56.25 (1) Fair values are month-end spot prices published by Ux Consulting Company LLC, translated at the Bank of Canada's month-end daily exchange rate of $1.2893.
On Oct. 31, 2017, the common shares of UPC closed on the Toronto Stock Exchange at a value of $3.51, which represents a 6.36-per-cent premium to the net asset value of $3.30 per share.
On Sept. 25, 2017, UPC announced a bought-deal equity offering of 10,745,000 common shares, at a price of $3.50 per share, for gross proceeds of $37,607,500, with an overallotment option of an additional 855,000 common shares at $3.50 per share. The offering was completed on Oct. 4, 2017, and the overallotment option was fully exercised. Accordingly, UPC issued 11.6 million common shares for total gross proceeds of $40.6-million. The proceeds of the offering are intended to be used by UPC to finance purchases of uranium and for general corporate purposes.
As at Oct. 31, 2017, UPC completed purchases and has taken delivery of 600,000 pounds U3O8, at an average cost of $20.29 (U.S.) ($25.42 (Canadian)) per pound.
About Uranium Participation Corp.
Uranium Participation is a company that invests substantially all of its assets in uranium oxide in concentrates (U3O8) and uranium hexafluoride (UF6), with the primary investment objective of achieving appreciation in the value of its uranium holdings through increases in the uranium price. UPC provides investors with a unique opportunity to gain exposure to the price of uranium without the resource or project risk associated with investing in a traditional mining company. Additional information about Uranium Participation is available on SEDAR and on Uranium Participation's website.
We seek Safe Harbor.

thread.title: Ankara'ya bin bekçi alınacak
thread.title_full: Ankara'ya bin bekçi alınacak

posts.author: NTV
posts.title: Ankara'ya bin bekçi alınacak
posts.text:
Ankara'nın Altındağ, Çankaya, Etimesgut, Keçiören, Mamak, Pursaklar, Yenimahalle, Gölbaşı ve Sincan ilçelerinde görev yapmak üzere bin bekçi alınacağı bildirildi. 
Ankara'nın bazı ilçelerinde görevlendirilmek üzere bin bekçi alınacağı bildirildi. 
Ankara Valiliğinden yapılan açıklamaya göre, Altındağ, Çankaya, Etimesgut, Keçiören, Mamak, Pursaklar, Yenimahalle, Gölbaşı ve Sincan ilçelerine bin çarşı ve mahalle bekçisi alınacak.772 sayılı Çarşı ve Mahalle Bekçisi Kanunu kapsamında emniyet hizmetleri sınıfında Altındağ'a 90, Çankaya'ya 225, Etimesgut'a 90, Keçiören'e 170, Mamak'a 150, Pursaklar'a 25, Yenimahalle'ye 120, Gölbaşı'na 20 ve Sincan'a 110 olmak üzere bin çarşı ve mahalle bekçisi alımı yapılacak.Adaylarda, "erkek ve Türk vatandaşı olmak, en az lise ve dengi okul, ön lisans, lisans veya lisansüstü mezunu olmak, 30 yaşından büyük olmamak" şartları aranacak. Şartları taşıyan adaylar, öncelikle mülakat tabi tutulacak, mülakatta geçerli not alan adaylar yazılı sınava girmeye hak kazanacak. Yazılı sınav sonuçlarına göre asil ve yedek aday listesi belirlenecek. İlin merkez ilçe sınırları içinde çalıştırılmak üzere alınacak adaylar için giriş sınavları Valilikçe il merkezinde, diğer ilçelerde ise Kaymakamlıklarca ilçe merkezinde yapılacak. Valiliğin ya da kaymakamlıkların internet sitesinden yapılacak tüm duyurular, adaylar için tebligat niteliğinde olacak. Alım sürecinin herhangi bir aşamasında başvuru şartlarını taşımadıkları anlaşılan adayların işlemleri iptal edilecek.Başvurular 22 Kasım-6 Aralık tarihlerinde ilgili ilçe emniyet müdürlüklerine yapılacak.Sözlü sınav 11-15 Aralık'ta gerçekleştirilecek. Bu sınavda 100 tam puan üzerinden 70 alanlar yazılı sınava girmeye hak kazanacak.Yazılı sınav ise 23 Aralık'ta yapılacak. Her bir sorunun 2 puan üzerinden değerlendirileceği sınavda, yanlış cevaplar doğru cevapları etkilemeyecek.Adaylar, başvuru sırasında gereken evraklar ile diğer bilgilere Ankara Valiliğinin "ankara.gov.tr" sitesinden ulaşabiliyor. ETİKETLER

thread.title: "Hästen har otrolig kapacitet"
thread.title_full: "Hästen har otrolig kapacitet"

posts.author: Johan Jernroos
posts.title: "Hästen har otrolig kapacitet"
posts.text:
Test Pilot och Kaj Widell jagar revansch efter förlusten senast. Foto: MICKE GUSTAFSSON/ALN 
Magnus Träffs Test Pilot är ute efter revansch idag efter förlusten som favorit senast. Denna gång åker det helstängda huvudlaget på igen och hemmatränaren andas optimism. Dela 
– Test Pilot (V4-2) tävlade med ett öppet huvudlag senast då vi ville få honom lite lugnare, men han agerade mer än lovligt segt och det helstängda huvudlaget åker på nu igen och hästen lär vara mer fokuserad denna gång. Spår nio var precis vad vi hoppats på. Han kan strula till det lite för sig in i första sväng och bakspår är därför positivt. Hästen har otrolig kapacitet och sköter han sig bör han sluta i segerstriden. Det blir eventuellt en ryckhuva för första gången idag, säger Magnus Träff. Ämnen i artikeln V4 , BOLLNÄS , MAGNUS TRÄFF , TEST PILOT   Johan Jernroos

posts.text: [현장IS] "시험대 오르겠다" 벼랑끝 조덕제 온몸던진 항변(종합) [일간스포츠] 입력 2017.11.07 18:32 핀터레스트 URL 복사 SNS 공유 더보기 닫기 왜 조덕제는 '유죄'를 받아야 했을까. 조덕제 본인은 물론, 현장에서 상황을 지켜 본 주요 스태프, 메이킹 필름 촬영기사까지 '이해할 수 없다'는 이유로 입을 열었고, 조덕제의 편을 들고 나섰다.결국 대법원의 판결에 달렸지만 여배우B와 감독 측의 주장이 추가로 전해지고 있는 상황에서 '과정의 찝찝함'은 남기고 싶지 않다는 것이 이들의 주장이다.7일 오후 3시 서울 종로구 피앤티 스퀘어에서는 스퀘어에서 '성추행 파문'에 휩싸인 배우 조덕제의 2차 기자회견이 열렸다. 이 날 기자회견은 영화 '사랑은 없다(장훈 감독)' 주요 스태프가 직접 진행, 조덕제와 메이킹 촬영기사가 참석해 당시 현장에 관한 상세한 이야기를 전했다.여배우 B는 2015년 4월, 저예산 영화를 함께 촬영한 조덕제를 '강제추행치사 혐의'로 고소했다. 지난해 12월 열린 1심 재판에서 조덕제는 '무죄'를 선고 받았지만, 지난 달 13일 2심 항소심에서는 징역 1년, 집행유예 2년, 성폭력 치료프로그램 40시간 이수라는 '양형'이 내려졌다.조덕제는 곧바로 상고에 나섰고 자신의 실명과 얼굴까지 공개하고 언론에 대응하고 있다. 이후 여배우B 측의 공식 기자회견, 영화를 진두지휘한 장훈 감독의 폭로가 이어졌고 급기야 당시 현장 상황을 담은 메이킹 필름 영상까지 공개됐다.조덕제는 이 날 추가 성명서를 통해 해당 사건을 이슈화 시키려는 여성 단체들과, 이들의 입장만 신뢰하고 있는 몇몇 영화 단체들에 대한 아쉬움을 표했다.메이킹필름 촬영기사는 "여배우가 왜 뻔한 거짓말을 하는지 모르겠다"며 필름을 촬영하고 검찰에 제출하게 된 경위를 상세히 밝혔다. 또 한 명의 주요 스태프 역시 같은 입장이다.조덕제는 그의 표현처럼 이미 유죄를 받은 범죄자다. 남은 것은 대법원 판결 뿐이다. 더 이상 잃을 것이 없으니 숨길 것도 없다. 그의 주장과 호소가 어떤 결과를 초래할지 끝나지 않은 영화계 초유의 성추문 파문에 관심은 지속되고 있다. "조사해 달라, 시험대 오르겠다" 조덕제 2차 성명 억울함과 답답함을 표명하는 것은 한 번으로 족하다. 조덕제의 2차 성명의 쟁점은 역시 '진실을 알리고 싶다'는 것이었지만 것이다. 그리고 그 대상은 여배우B에서 영화 단체로 넓어졌다.물론 '성추행을 하지 않았다'는 조덕제 주장 자체는 변함없다. 조덕제는 "연기로라도 손이 갈 수 있는 것 아니냐"는 질문에 "그 정도는 판단할 수 있다. 하지 않았다"고 잘라 말했다.특히 조덕제는 영화 단체들의 안일한 행동을 문제 삼았는데, '영화계 신문고'가 '재판중인 사건은 다루거나 심리하지 않는다'는 이유로 자신의 사건을 다루지 않았다고 지적했다. 하지만 1심 판결 후에는 역시 재판 진행 중임에도 불구하고 철저히 여배우 입장에서 조덕제를 비난하고 나섰다는 것.조덕제는 "조단역 배우들과 열악한 처우에도 대의를 꿈꾸는 수 많은 영화 스태프들에게 좌절을 안길 수 없다"며 "나를 조사해 달라. 어떤 시험대라도 오르겠다. 영화인들이 조사하고 검증한 결과라면 마땅히그 결과를 존중하고 받아들이겠다"고 거듭 어필했다. "여배우 거짓말" 메이킹 촬영기사 입 열었다 최근 온라인에는 '조덕제 사건의 키'라 표현할 수 있는 메이킹 영상이 공개됐다. 해당 영상을 직접 촬영한 촬영기사는 "조작·짜집기는 절대 없다"며 "검찰에 직접 제출했다"고 밝혔다.촬영기사는 여배우B가 조덕제를 '성추행 혐의'로 고소했다는 소식을 접한 후 두 사람이 오해를 푸는데 있어 메이킹 영상이 중요한 역할을 할 것이라 판단해 여배우B와 조덕제에게 모두 메이킹 필름의 존재를 알렸다고 한다. 하지만 여배우B는 관심을 가지지 않았고, 조덕제와 조덕제 변호사는 '녹취록이라도 줄 수 없겠냐'는 부탁을 했다는 후문이다.촬영기사는 "여배우B는 '메이킹 필름 존재를 몰랐다가 1심이 끝난 후 알았다'고 인터뷰 했다. 왜 그런 뻔한 거짓말 거짓말을 하는지 모르겠다. 2015년 9월께 여배우에게 보낸 메시지도 갖고 있다"며 "심지어 난 여배우B 아버지도 직접 만났다. 하지만 아버지 역시 '모르는 일'이라고 외면했다. 결국 조덕제에게 도움이 된 영상인데 이제서야 조작이다 '조작이다, 편집이다짜집기다는 , 짜집기다'라는 왜곡된 주장을 펼치고 있다"고 꼬집었다. "여배우 주장 불가능" 주요 스태프도 동참 배우의 스케줄, 컨디션, 의상, 분장 등을 담당한 주요 스태프는 "증거를 언론에 공개할 수는 없지만 말로 설명할 수는 있다"며 입을 열었다.스태프는 "여배우가 입은 등산복은 일단 사람 손을 넣는다는 자체가 불가능하다불가능 하다. 감독님이 계신 모니터 앞에 직접 있었는데 4분이 넘는 시간동안 '컷'을 외치지도 않았다. 그 때부터 '이상하다'고 생각했다"고 전했다.그는 "현장에서 설정이 바뀌는 일이 비일비재했다. 배우들, 분장팀, 의상팀이 알고 있는 상황이 모두 달랐다. 그 과정에서 여배우와 스태프들의 짜증도 감내해야 했다"고 회상했다. "배우 개인 책임질 일 아냐" 법조계 반응 해당 사건을 면밀히 분석한 한 변호사는 "일부 편향된 여성 단체들의 주장이 받아들여지면서 이번 사건은 영화계 형사소송으로 번지는 치명적 오류가 발생했다. 영화계 전문성 대표성은 물론 객관성 조차 보장받지 못했다"고 분석했다.또 "향후 이러한 일이 배우 개인에게 떠넘겨서는 안 될 문제다. 영화인들의 식견을 통해 분석하는 일이 선행되어야 한다"고 덧붙였다.조연경 기자

posts.title: (USA-ID-Boise) Police Officer
posts.text:
City of Boise Police Officer in Boise , Idaho 
Police Officer 
Summary Statement 
General Statement of Duties: 
Preserves the public peace, protects life and property, prevents crimes, arrests violators of the law, enforces all laws and ordinances. Patrols assigned area using motorcycle, patrol car or on foot; responds to calls for service, initiates police action when appropriate; investigates crimes in progress; mediates disputes; renders aid to the sick, injured and those desiring assistance. Work requires use of discretion and independent judgment and is reviewed by inspection and observation from senior staff while on the job, verbal and written reports, and quantitative and qualitative evaluations. Performs related work as required. 
Entry Level Officer starting salary is $47,132.80. 
Lateral Officer starting salary is $59,675.20. 
Essential Functions 
Provides information and assistance to motorists, cyclists, and pedestrians regarding traffic violations, traffic issues, and relevant issues as required. Patrols an assigned area with the goal of preventing traffic violations and accidents. Aids persons in trouble and makes referrals to other agencies as appropriate. Issues warnings and/or citations for nonmoving and moving violations. Conducts traffic stops, performs appropriate field tests on citizens suspected of Driving While Intoxicated (DWI), searches vehicles, and arrests suspects based on probable cause. (30%) 
Responds to reports of suspected violation in-progress and general calls for service such as burglar alarms, armed robberies, assaults, disturbance of the peace, and other issues as they arise. Identifies issues upon arriving on scene, and takes appropriate actions such as mediating disputes, securing crime scenes, gathering evidence, etc. Interviews available victims, witnesses and suspects. Handles and assists with criminal investigations. (15%) 
Provides oversight and direction to subordinate staff and officers to address criminal and police related issues as they arise. Identifies and prioritizes issues, considers various alternatives, resources, and makes sound decisions to resolve issues. (15%) 
Assumes command responsibility for conduct and effectiveness of patrol officers and other specialists when acting as the Field Commander in the absence of a Sergeant. Responds to calls and assists officers in particularly difficult or hazardous assignments. Ensures appropriate emergency and related agencies have been notified of issues as required. Reviews reports for compliance with departmental standards. (15%) 
Maintains positive rapport with prosecutors, courts, witnesses, victims, and related staff. Provides court testimony, depositions, and related case management support as required. (15%) 
Initiates, performs, and assists with probable-cause arrests in compliance with all city, state, and federal standards. Responds to, assists with, and/or otherwise notifies proper authorities of emergencies, immediate public safety issues, and related incidents as they occur. (10%) 
Performs other duties as assigned. Nothing in this job description restricts management's right to assign or reassign duties and responsibilities to this position at any time. Total Percentage = 100% 
Requirements 
Required Knowledge, Experience, And Training 
Must be a citizen of the United States. 
Must be 21 by the date of hire. 
Have the equivalent of an Associate's Degree or completed 60 semester credits from a regionally accredited college (to verify if a college is accredited, click here) OR Individuals with prior military service must have complete 30 semester credit hours OR have an Idaho POST Intermediate Certificate. An out of state Intermediate Certificate equivalent may be substituted for the college requirement. 
Automatic Disqualifiers with Boise Police are as follows: 
Marijuana use within the past three (3) years. 
Other controlled substance use within the past five (5) years. 
Felony Convictions over the age of 18. 
DUI in last two (2) years. 
Two (2) DUI's in last five (5) years. 
More than 5 traffic violations in last three (3) years. 
If you are unsure if you meet these requirements, please visit Minimum Standards of Employment as accepted by the Idaho Peace Officer Standards & Training (POST) Council. 
Lateral Officers: 
Must meet the above standards. 
Have at least one year of patrol experience off probation. 
Be in good standing with current department. 
Licensing And Other Requirements 
Ability to obtain a Peace Officer Standards Training (POST) Certification. 
This position is required to qualify and maintain qualification standards to carry firearms. 
Special Requirements 
All applicants must be able to successfully pass City of Boise background check processes which include reference checks and criminal history checks. 
Applicants must be able to pass, or have: Written Exam Driving Record Check Education Verification Polygraph Exam Post Offer Medical Examination Physical Fitness Test Psychological Evaluation (by licensed psychologist) Pre-employment Drug Test 
Top talent deserves top notch benefits. The City is among the best in the Treasure Valley when it comes to the benefits and perks we offer our employees. 
Most positions are eligible for the general benefits listed here; fire fighters, police officers, senior managers, command staff, and directors may be offered other benefit plans. 
Healthcare Low deductible medical, dental, and vision benefits at no cost for employee-only coverage, up to just $118 per month to cover your whole family as a regular full time employee. 
Retirement and Investment Plans 
Public Employee's Retirement System of Idaho (PERSI) provides a defined benefit retirement account with 100% vesting after 60 months of eligible service. 6.79% of your pre-tax wages go to the plan, and the City contributes 11.32%. Your retirement benefit is based on a formula which looks at your years of service and income and so creates a predictable retirement benefit not affected by changes in the investment market. 
401(k) or 457 investment options are also available to complete your retirement plan with the City of Boise! As a general employee you will receive a match for your contributions up to 2% of your pre-tax wages. 
The City puts money into a HRA VEBA for you to use to pay for health expenses after you leave City employment. 
Wellness Program 
You can earn up to $500 per year by participating in optional wellness program activities and annual hosted health screening event. 
Employee Assistance Program for short-term counseling on work, family, finances and personal issues. 
Paid Leave – City employees receive generous paid leave: 
8 hours of vacation per month, and this increases the longer you stay with the City 
10 paid holidays every year 
8 hours of sick leave per month 
Up to six weeks Parental Leave 
Life & Long Term Disability- 
Basic Life insurance at no cost to you 
Long Term Disability insurance at no cost to you 
Other optional benefits –
